disclaimer.title: Trading Disclaimer
disclaimer.highRiskWarning: Binary options trading involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for all investors. You should carefully consider whether trading is appropriate for you in light of your circumstances, knowledge, and financial resources.
disclaimer.noGuaranteeText: There is no guarantee that you will always win or make profits from binary options trading. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
disclaimer.riskOfLossText: You may lose some or all of your invested capital. Binary options trading carries a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage.
disclaimer.informationOnlyText: This application provides information and guidance for binary options trading only. It does not constitute financial advice, investment recommendations, or trading signals.
disclaimer.investResponsiblyText: Only invest money that you can afford to lose completely. Never invest money that you need for essential expenses or cannot afford to lose.
disclaimer.educationalPurposeText: This application is designed for educational and informational purposes only. It is not intended to provide specific investment advice or recommendations.
disclaimer.noFinancialAdviceText: The information provided should not be considered as financial, investment, or trading advice. Always consult with a qualified financial advisor before making investment decisions.
disclaimer.marketRisksText: Financial markets are volatile and unpredictable. Market conditions can change rapidly, and there is always a risk of significant financial loss.
disclaimer.technicalLimitationsText: While we strive to provide accurate information, technical issues, data delays, or system failures may occur. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information provided.
disclaimer.regulatoryComplianceText: Binary options trading may be restricted or prohibited in your jurisdiction. It is your responsibility to ensure compliance with local laws and regulations.
disclaimer.responsibility1: Conduct your own research and due diligence before making any trading decisions
disclaimer.responsibility2: Understand the risks involved in binary options trading
disclaimer.responsibility3: Only trade with money you can afford to lose
disclaimer.responsibility4: Monitor your positions and manage your risk appropriately
disclaimer.responsibility5: Seek professional financial advice if needed
disclaimer.responsibility6: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
disclaimer.finalWarningText: By using this application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these disclaimers. You understand the risks involved and accept full responsibility for your trading decisions and their consequences.
disclaimer.contactText: If you have any questions about these disclaimers, please contact us before using the application.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our binary options trading application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data.
privacy.personalInformationText: Name, email address, phone number, and other identifying information you provide during registration.
privacy.usageDataText: Information about how you interact with our application, including pages visited, features used, and time spent.
privacy.tradingDataText: Your trading history, positions, balances, and other financial information related to your trading activities.
privacy.deviceInformationText: Device type, operating system, browser information, IP address, and other technical data.
privacy.use1: Provide and maintain our trading services
privacy.use2: Process your trading transactions and manage your account
privacy.use3: Send you important updates and notifications about your account
privacy.use4: Improve our application and develop new features
privacy.use5: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
privacy.use6: Protect against fraud and ensure platform security
privacy.securityMeasuresText: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to protect your data.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.right1: Access your personal data we hold about you
privacy.right2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.right3: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.right4: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy.right5: Request data portability to another service
privacy.right6: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at privacy@yourapp.com
privacy.policyUpdates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service
terms.importantNoticeText: By accessing and using this trading application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.acceptanceText: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of our trading application and services. By accessing, browsing, or using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.acceptance1: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service
terms.acceptance2: You must have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements
terms.acceptance3: You are responsible for ensuring your use complies with local laws
terms.serviceText: Our application provides trading tools and analysis for financial markets. The service includes:
terms.serviceImportantText: This service is for informational and educational purposes only. We do not provide financial advice.
terms.accountsText: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You agree to:
terms.accounts1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
terms.accounts2: Maintain and update your account information
terms.accounts3: Keep your login credentials secure and confidential
terms.accounts4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
terms.accounts5: You are responsible for all activities under your account
terms.prohibitedText: You may not use our service for any unlawful or prohibited activities, including:
terms.prohibited1: Violating any applicable laws or regulations
terms.prohibited2: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
terms.prohibited3: Interfering with or disrupting the service
terms.prohibited4: Creating multiple accounts to circumvent restrictions
terms.prohibited5: Using automated systems to access the service without permission
terms.prohibited6: Sharing your account credentials with others
terms.prohibited7: Engaging in any form of market manipulation
terms.riskWarningText: Trading involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for all investors. Past performance is not indicative of future results.
terms.risk1: All trading involves risk of financial loss
terms.risk2: You should never trade with money you cannot afford to lose
terms.risk3: Market conditions can change rapidly and unpredictably
terms.risk4: You are solely responsible for your trading decisions
terms.risk5: We do not guarantee any specific results or profits
terms.ipText: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.ip1: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission
terms.ip2: You may not reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code
terms.ip3: You may not use our trademarks or logos without written consent
terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service, to understand our practices.
terms.privacyDataText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information, but no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
terms.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.
terms.termination1: You may terminate your account at any time
terms.termination2: Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately
terms.termination3: We may delete your account data after termination
terms.termination4: Certain provisions of these Terms survive termination
terms.disclaimersText: The service is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to:
terms.disclaimers1: Warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose
terms.disclaimers2: Warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of information
terms.disclaimers3: Warranties that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free
terms.disclaimers4: Warranties regarding the security of the service
terms.liabilityText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to:
terms.liability1: Loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses
terms.liability2: Damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service
terms.liability3: Damages resulting from unauthorized access to your account
terms.liability4: Damages resulting from any conduct or content of third parties
terms.governingText: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the service shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of competent jurisdiction.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the “Last Updated” date.
terms.changesContinuedText: Your continued use of the service after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
terms.footerText: By using this service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
